metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Free SSL/TLS | Get SSL Certificates
metaTags.metaDescription: SSL establishes an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. Get free Cloudflare SSL/TLS certificates to encrypt communication for secure web traffic.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Not sure what SSL is or how to use it? Read more in our Learning Center.

relatedBlades.title: Free SSL / TLS
relatedBlades.subtitle: Included for free with ALL application service plans
relatedBlades.copy:
- Get "the lock" to show visitors your website is trustworthy and their data protected. 
- Improve your SEO ranking. Search engines favor SSL websites in search rankings.
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Enterprise plans include SSL, and much more! Schedule a demo!](#ent-demo-form "SSL Enterprise Demo")
relatedBlades.leftLinkLoggedIn: [Enterprise plans include SSL, and much more! Schedule a demo!](#ent-demo-form "SSL Enterprise Demo")

imageAssetFile.title: What is SSL - HTTP vs. HTTPS

features.title: Improve Website Performance
features.description: Cloudflare's modern SSL improves webpage load times to provide a better visitor experience on your website.

features.title: Protect Website Visitors
features.description: Encrypting traffic with SSL ensures nobody can snoop on your users' data and is important for PCI compliance.

features.title: Boost Search Rankings
features.description: Search engines like Google®, favor SSL websites in keyword rankings. Easily increase your website SEO.

features.title: Easy Setup
features.description: Set up a domain in less than 5 minutes. Keep your hosting provider. No code changes required.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by the biggest brands worldwide
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare named a 2022 Gartner® Peer Insights™ Customers' Choice for  CDN<sup>2</sup> & WAAP<sup>3</sup>

relatedBlades.title: Upgrade your website security and performance with free SSL & so much more!

planFeatures.description: Cloudflare is compatible with your existing SSL configuration. If you do not currently use SSL, Cloudflare can provide you with SSL capabilities — no configuration required.

planFeatures.name: CDN
planFeatures.description: Our %{DataCenterCount} data centers located across the globe provide visitors with location-based access to your website, while removing latency and improving performance.

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Accelerated Mobile Pages
planFeatures.description: Mirage automatically optimizes image loading through virtualized and lazyloaded images. It detects the browser type of a visitor and optimizes performance for the particular device, improving the performance of images on a mobile connection.

planFeatures.name: Bot Mitigation

plan.name: Enterprise
plan.description: For mission-critical applications that are core to your business.

features.title: 24/7/365 support via chat, email, and phone
features.description: Phone, chat, and email support with median response time of 15 minutes. For critical business issues, Enterprise customers have access to our 24/7/365 emergency phone support hotline.

features.title: 100% uptime guarantee with 25x reimbursement SLA
features.description: In the rare event of downtime, Enterprise customers receive a 25x credit against the monthly fee, in proportion to the respective disruption and affected customer ratio.

features.title: Predictable flat-rate pricing for usage based products
features.description: Only enterprise customers can negotiate flat rate pricing on Argo, Rate limiting, Workers, Load Balancing, Live Stream and more.

features.title: Advanced Cache controls
features.description: Enterprise customers have lower TTLs and can purge cache by tag or host.

features.title: Bot management
features.description: Use the power of Cloudflare's network to intelligently manage bot traffic to your application in order to prevent credential stuffing, inventory hoarding, content scraping and other types of fraud.

features.title: Access to raw logs
features.description: Take charge of your data and run your own analytics using raw log data from web assets on Cloudflare's network.

features.title: Firewall analytics
features.description: Understand the impact of your WAF configuration. Firewall Analytics let you know if a rule is effective by illustrating the impact in an easy to digest format.

features.title: Role based access
features.description: Provide role-based access throughout your organization. Each user is given set permissions, individual API keys, and optional two-factor authentication.

features.title: Network prioritization
features.description: Enterprise web assets are placed on Cloudflare dedicated IP ranges, providing prioritized routing and protection to ensure maximum speed and availability.
